pageProduct.name: Oral B Teeth Whitening Toothpaste 3D White Luxe Diamond Strong 95g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Oral-B 3D White Luxe Diamond Strong Toothpaste removes stains for whiter teeth in 3 days (by removing surface stains) & strengthens enamel.

Oral-B 3D White Luxe Diamond Strong Toothpaste removes stains for whiter teeth in 3 days (by removing surface stains) & strengthens enamel.

Dissolving polishing complex:

- Whiter teeth in 3 days* (*Whitens teeth by removing surface stains. Individual results may vary).

- Whiten by unlocking trapped surface stains.

- Protects against new stains.

- Leaves your smile clean and fresh.

Size: 95g

KEY FEATURES

• Removes up to 100% of surface stains in 5 days
• Innovative stains dissolving particles unlock trapped surface stains on teeth and protect against new stains
• Enamel safe formula
• Strengthens enamel
• Mint flavor

Warnings

Do not swallow. Do not use this product in children 6 years of age or less. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.

Ingredients

Contains Sodium Fluoride. Glycerin, Hydrated Silica, Sodium Polyphosphate, Water, PEG-6, Flavour, Trisodium Phosphate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Saccharin, Carrageenan, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Fluoride, Xanthan Gum, Mica, Sucralose, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Potassium Sorbate, CI 77891, Titanium Dioxide.

Directions

Apply the product onto a soft bristled toothbrush. Brush teeth thoroughly at least twice a day (morning and evening) or as recommended by a dentist.
